perns.leadParagraph: Check the following information is correct before creating this PERN.
perns.insetText: Any information not shown here will be automatically populated when the PERN is issued.

prns.leadParagraph: Check the following information is correct before creating this PRN.
prns.insetText: Any information not shown here will be automatically populated when the PRN is issued.

checkDetails.recipient: Packaging waste producer or compliance scheme

create.helpSummary: Can't find the producer or compliance scheme?
create.recipientHint: Start typing the name of the packaging waste producer or compliance scheme
create.tonnageHint: Enter a whole number without decimal places

perns.recipientLabel: Enter who this PERN will be issued to
perns.helpText: PERNs can only be issued to packaging waste producers and compliance schemes who have registered with regulators. If the buyer you're looking for is not appearing, check that you have spelled the name correctly and that they are registered with a regulator.
perns.notesHint: These notes will appear on the PERN

prns.recipientLabel: Enter who this PRN will be issued to
prns.helpText: PRNs can only be issued to packaging waste producers and compliance schemes who have registered with regulators. If the buyer you're looking for is not appearing, check that you have spelled the name correctly and that they are registered with a regulator.
prns.notesHint: These notes will appear on the PRN

table.recipientHeading: Packaging waste producer or compliance scheme

perns.balanceHint: This is the balance available for creating new PERNs
perns.cancelHint: If you cancel a PERN, its tonnage will be added to your available waste balance.

prns.balanceHint: This is the balance available for creating new PRNs
prns.cancelHint: If you cancel a PRN, its tonnage will be added to your available waste balance.
